text: The Golden Coach (; ) is a 1952 French Italian comedy drama movie directed by Jean Renoir and is based on the 1829 play Le Carrosse du Saint-Sacrement (The Coach of the Blessed Sacrament) by Prosper Mérimée. It stars Anna Magnani, Odoardo Spadaro, Duncan Lamont, Nada Fiorelli. == Other websites == * * Category:1952 comedy-drama movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Jean Renoir
title: The Golden Coach
